Detailed Description

Computes the weighted levenshtein distance of two words.

Author:
Nurhan Sayhan, Musa Ilker Hatipoglu, Ahmet Saglam

bool fsdict::ComputeInstruction::computeInstruction ( std::wstring const &  wCorr,
std::wstring const &  wErr,
std::vector< Instruction > *  instruction = 0 
)

Computes the weight levenshtein distance of two words.

Parameters:
wCorr The correct word
wErr The incorrect word
[out] instructions is a pointer to a vector of instructions, which is filled with all (equally) best ways to transform the strings.
